sentences.en: If the banks opt to pull the rug from under the ill-fated project, it will go into liquidation.
sentences.cn: 如果这些银行选择不再支持那项倒霉的工程，它就将破产。

sentences.en: John clapped his hands on the ill-fated pirate's mouth to stifle the dying groan.
sentences.cn: 约翰用手捂住那个倒霉的海盗的嘴，想止住他临死前的呻吟。

sentences.en: Scott and his crew stayed at the hut before their ill-fated Terra Nova expedition to the South Pole in January 1912.
sentences.cn: 在1912年1月，斯科特和他的船员在命运不佳的 Terra Nova 探险队前往南极之前，他们一直住在那个小木屋里。
